title: RuntimeError: Attempted to use a closed Session.

labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

whenever i run training. it runs all the way to the end. but then gives an error
"RuntimeError: Attempted to use a closed Session."

though it appears the model is actually fine.

### Operating System

operating system: WIN10

### DeepLabCut version

dlc version
'2.2.0.6'

### DeepLabCut mode

single animal

### Device type

gpu: A6000

### Steps To Reproduce

import deeplabcut
   ...: import os
   ...: %env CUDA_DEVICE_ORDER=PCI_BUS_ID
   ...: %env CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,1
   ...: import tensorflow as tf
   ...: gpu_devices = tf.config.experimental.list_physical_devices('GPU')
   ...: for device in gpu_devices:
   ...:     tf.config.experimental.set_memory_growth(device, True)
   ...: path_config_file=r'D:\DLC_projects\generalizard_Single-SW-2022-02-15\config.yaml'
   ...: config_path=path_config_file
   ...: path_config_file=config_path
   ...: shuffle=3
env: CUDA_DEVICE_ORDER=PCI_BUS_ID
env: CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,1
deeplabcut.train_network(
   ...:     path_config_file, shuffle=1, max_snapshots_to_keep=11, gputouse=1, allow_growth=True
   ...: )

### Relevant log output
